special_text:
[+1]: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand, one on top of your library, and one on the bottom of your library.
[0]: Exile target nonland permanent. Return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control at the beginning of your next upkeep.
[-4]: Until your next turn, each player skips their beginning phase. [i](The beginning phase includes the untap, upkeep, and draw steps.)[/i]
